thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 01 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Under Armour Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.00

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Under Armour Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.00
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Under Armour Inc:
* UNDER ARMOUR REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 TO $0.19 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q1 REVENUE $1.2 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.12 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REITERATES FULL YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK * QTRLY NORTH AMERICA REVENUE WAS RELATIVELY FLAT (DOWN 1 PERCENT CURRENCY NEUTRAL)
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17, REVENUE VIEW $5.11 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS REVENUE UP 27 PERCENT (UP 19 PERCENT CURRENCY NEUTRAL)
* INVENTORY INCREASED 27 PERCENT TO $1.1 BILLION IN QUARTER
* QTRLY GROSS MARGIN DECLINED 120 BASIS POINTS TO 44.2 PERCENT
* QTRLY ADJUSTED GROSS MARGIN, WHICH EXCLUDES $8 MILLION IMPACT RELATED TO RESTRUCTURING EFFORTS, WAS 44.8 PERCENT, DOWN 60 BASIS POINTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
